request.description:
This endpoint allows a user to log in by providing their email and password.
If the credentials are correct, it returns an access token and user information.
This endpoint logs out the authenticated user by revoking all their tokens.

formdata.description: The unique identifier for the company profile.
The name of the contact person.
The date of filling REX number.
Indicates if partial shipment is allowed.

request.description: This endpoint allows you to update the company profile details. The variables are in snake_case and should be provided in the request body. company_logo and signature_upload both send direct file only, don't refer example for both.

Display a listing of the company raw materials.
This endpoint returns a list of all company raw materials.

This endpoint allows you to create a new company raw material.

variable.description: The ID of the company raw material to delete.

request.description:
Remove the specified company raw material from storage.
This endpoint allows you to delete a company raw material by providing its ID.

item.name: Calculate the totals for pallets, bags, bags per pallet, weight per bag, and total weight.

request.description:
This endpoint calculates the sum of various properties of company raw materials filtered by a specific date.
The properties include total pallet count, total bag count, total bags per pallet count, total weight per bag count, and total weight count.

item.name: Calculate the totals for pallets, bags, bags per pallet, weight per bag, and total weight.

request.description:
This endpoint calculates the sum of various properties of company raw materials filtered by a specific date.
The properties include total pallet count, total bag count, total bags per pallet count, total weight per bag count, and total weight count.

item.name: Display a listing of the PI Reports.

request.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of PI Reports created by the authenticated user,
including detailed information such as the exporter's and consignee's details,
product information, and financial data. Each PI Report also contains associated
product information, such as packaging details, quantity, and pricing in USD.

{
 "status": "success",
 "piReportsExport": [

request.description:
This endpoint creates a new PI Report with the specified details and associated products.
It accepts various details related to the exporter, consignee, and product information.
After creation, the associated product details are stored in the `PiReportExportProduct` model.

variable.description: The ID of the PI Report.

item.name: Display a listing of the PO Reports.

request.description:
This endpoint returns a list of all PO Reports created by the authenticated user,
including associated product details.

response.body:
{
 "status": "success",
 "poReports": [
     {
         "id": "15fjl5-4f45t-5g456y-g5t",
         "po_no": "PO12345",
         "po_date": "2023-06-25",
         "quotation_no": "Q12345",
         "quotation_date": "2023-06-20",
         "buyer_name": "Buyer A",
         "buyer_address": "123 Street, City, Country",
         "buyer_pan": "ABCDE1234F",
         "buyer_iec": "IEC1234567",
         "buyer_gst": "GST123456",
         "buyer_mail": "buyer@example.com",
         "buyer_contact_person": "John Doe",
         "buyer_contact_no": "1234567890",
         "created_by": 1,
         "igst": 18,
         "sgst": 9,
         "cgst": 9,
         "total_value": 1000,
         "amount_in_words": "One Thousand",
         "notes_1": "Note 1",
         "notes_2": "Note 2",
         "notes_3": "Note 3",
         "notes_4": "Note 4",
         "poReportProducts": [
             {
                 "id": "12345jl5-4f45t-5g45",
                 "po_report_id": "15fjl5-4f45t-5g456y-g5t",
                 "product_description": "Product A",
                 "hsn_code": "1234",
                 "quantity": 10,
                 "unit": "pcs",
                 "rate": 100,
                 "amount": 1000
             }
         ]
     }
 ]
}

item.name: Store a newly created PO Report in storage.

request.description: This endpoint allows for the creation of a new PO Report along with its associated product details.

item.name: Update the specified PO Report in storage.

variable.description: The ID of the PO Report.

request.description:
This endpoint allows for updating a specific PO Report by its ID,
including associated product details.

item.name: Remove the specified PO Report from storage.

variable.description: The ID of the PO Report.

request.description:
This endpoint deletes a specific PO Report by its ID,
including associated product details.

query.description: The PO number of the PO Report.

request.description:
This endpoint returns the details of a specific PO Report by its PO number,
including associated product details.

response.body:

 "status": "success",
 "poReports": {
     "id": "15fjl5-4f45t-5g456y-g5t",

request.description: Get a list of all products available in system.
It store a newly created product in the system.

variable.description: The ID of the product to update.

request.description: It update the specified product in the system.

variable.description: The ID of the product to delete.

request.description: It remove the specified product from the system.
Get a list of all sizes available in system.

Store a newly created size in the database.
This endpoint allows you to store size details. The variables should be provided in the request body.

variable.description: The ID of the size to update.

request.description:
Update the specified size in the database.
This endpoint allows you to update size details by providing the size ID and the updated information.

variable.description: The ID of the size to delete.

request.description:
Remove the specified size from the database.
This endpoint allows you to delete a size by providing its ID.
